ygData.subject: Re: Bear Hide Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: The way i did it with my Barbarian shaman when i was playing him was to kill bandits.  It increased my faction with the people of karanas then they would make
ygData.messageBody:
The way i did it with my Barbarian shaman when i was playing him was to kill
bandits. It increased my faction with the people of karanas then they would
make the armor for me. I don't know what other stuff in karanas increases
faction besides the bandits (ogres probably but too high a lvl)


Bloodshadow lvl 10 DE wiz veeshan
Valhala lvl 15 Bar shaman veeshan
-----Original Message-----
From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, June 28, 1999 8:17 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Bear Hide Armor


>From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
>Okay,
>
>The Bearhide Armor looks like kick-butt armor for low/medium level wizards.
Baobob will make me everything but the cloak. Chanda keeps getting killed
before I talk to her, but I assume I'll run into
>the same problem. How do I raise my faction with these guys so that they
will make me all the pieces of armor? The say I need to help there family
in the Karanas. I've talked to Mom, Pop, Jr, the
>Gnoll, and Tiny but have recieved no leeds on helping them.
>
>Thanks in Advance.
>Malkin
>
>P.S.
>Thanks for fixing your E-Mails Bob
